div.head: A short forme of prayer, very fit to be vsed of euery regular student in this Arte.
div.p: 1. Sam. 2.7. LORD, thou that art the giuer of riches, and sender of pouerty, incline mine heart vnto thy testimonies, Psa. 119.36. Pro. 30.8, 9. and not to couetousnesse; Giue me not pouerty nor riches too much, feede mee with foode conuenient for mee, lest I bee full, and deny thee, and say, who is the Lord, or least I be poore, and steale and take the name of my God in vaine. Amen.
